body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes       There is no fee to enter Brices Cross Roads National Battlefield Site. Enjoy your visit! There is a small admission fee to visit the museum at the Mississippi's Final Stands Interpretive Center located near the intersection of U.S. Highway 45 and Mississippi 370, six miles east of the battlefield. This is not a National Park Service facility. For more information about the museum, please contact Mississippi's Final Stands Interpretive Center at 662-365-3969.
title: Brices Cross Roads National Battlefield Site: Fees & Passes
